name: Space Slimes (LyonLin)
description:
Manage your resources to build a rocket and send your slimes to space!

Worker slimes carry resources to and from hubs.

Create blockades to manage the inflow of materials to meet the rockets requirements.

Controls:

  • Click and drag to place walls. 
  • Right click and drag to delete walls. 
  • Tap slimes to smush them. 
  • Middle Mouse Button to pan camera. 
  • Hold spacebar and scroll to rotate camera.
